column4: please someone help me to open port 5432 for a tcp connection to myself :(
just start a program that listens on that port if you're connecting from localhost
start a program that listens on port 5432
when i open my application and use nmap in another terminal it shows the port 5432 in the list of opened ports, but the server application stops running and gives me an error message
i tested in another place and it worked well, so the problem is with my computer
was this from the server or the client?
it might be a server bug
but worked perfectly in other place
kill the process that's using the socket that already bound it
tried... even restarting computer and connection didnt work
changing the port allows the client to connect to the server, but the server wont receive any message from the client. That was not happening before either
